scene_description_enriched: An elderly man with a long white beard, dressed in a patterned tunic and a blue robe, kneels with his hands clasped in prayer. He is positioned within an architectural setting that includes a large column and an altar-like structure to his left. Beyond this interior space, a landscape is visible, featuring green foliage and a distant city with fortified walls and towers. The scene is framed by an illuminated border with floral motifs.
